text: F was a rhamphorhyncoid pterosaur found in the Solnhofen limestone of the Upper Jurassic. It had wings that was about one meter long and a long tail shaped like a leaf. The leaf-tail probably acted like a rudder, helping it steer through the air. It was probably a diurnal (daytime) flier, where Rhamphorhynchus was probably nocturnal. == Diet == Scaphognathus ate Pholidophorus fish. == References == Category:Pterosaurs
title: Scaphognathus
